Modul htl.steyr.javafx_minesweeper_tplatzer
Package htl.steyr.javafx_minesweeper_tplatzer.model

Klasse UserDataManager

java.lang.Object
htl.steyr.javafx_minesweeper_tplatzer.model.UserDataManager
public class UserDataManager extends Object
The UserDataManager class handles the saving and loading of user data for the Minesweeper game.

This class provides methods to serialize and deserialize UserData objects to a file. The data is stored in a binary format to maintain user-specific information such as best times and usernames.

      public UserDataManager()

  • Methodendetails

    • saveUserData

      public static void saveUserData(UserData userData)
      Saves the given UserData object to a file.

      This method serializes the user data and writes it to a predefined file location. If the file does not exist, it is created.

      Parameter:
      userData - The UserData object to save.

    • loadUserData

      public static UserData loadUserData()
      Loads user data from a file.

      This method attempts to deserialize a UserData object from a predefined file location. If the file does not exist or an error occurs during deserialization, a new UserData object is returned.

      Gibt zurück:
      The UserData object loaded from the file, or a new UserData object if the operation fails.
